member.name: T:Gim.ErrorHandling.GenericExceptionHandlingForm
member.summary: Form that can show detialed information about an exception. Amonst others it allows to show the class and method where the exception occurred. It is also possible to show customized technical information for debugging, if the exception implements the IGenericExceptionHandling interface. All this information can be copied to the clipboard with a single click on a button.
